Posts.Content: MavJ wrote: I have been awake 2 nights till 4am with anxious thoughts running through my mind, I have a GP appointment booked for next monday but the wait is terrifying me. I have made a list for reasons why or why not this lump may indicate breast cancer. Here are all the reasons it could be cancerous: -It's like hard -It's under the skin and can be seen a little but is discreet (looks like a flattened bean). -It's not painful. -No head so I don't think it is a cyst. Here are reasons it most likely is not cancerous: -I'm 18 so the chances are low, but that doesn't stop me worrying. -It is smooth under the skin and moveable and doesn't feel attached to anything. -It's pretty high up, it sort of misses my right breast so perhaps that means something. -It hasn't changed in size. -I have no other symptoms linked to breast cancer -I don't have a family history. - I don't drink or smoke. Can anyone offer me some comfort? I wish I could see the doctor sooner but there are no appointments available. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 18 year old. Found hard lump under armpit near right breast MavJ MavJ

Posts.Content: Jul 25, 2016 02:52PM MavJ wrote: Thank you for the information, I am just anxiously waiting for monday now...
Posts.Title: 18 year old. Found hard lump under armpit near right breast MavJ MavJ
